title: ai-skills-sync configuration
description: Configuration file for ai-skills-sync, a per-project AI skill routing tool for coding agents.

$schema.description: JSON Schema URL for editor validation and autocomplete.

global.description: Skills synced to every project. Use for universally useful skills like TDD or debugging.

projects.description: Project-specific skills, keyed by absolute project root path (supports ~ for home directory). Only synced when running from the matching project.

conditional.description: Skills auto-activated when files matching a glob pattern exist in the project. Removed automatically when the pattern no longer matches.

items.description: A conditional rule: activates skills when the glob pattern matches files in the project.

when.description: Glob pattern to match against project files (e.g. "**/*.tsx", "*.tf"). Scans up to 3 levels deep, ignoring node_modules, .git, dist, and other build artifacts.

skills.description: Skills to activate when the glob pattern matches.

SkillRef.description: A reference to a skill. Points to a GitHub repository or a local directory.

source.description: Skill source: "owner/repo" for GitHub (optionally with @ref for version pinning), or "local" for filesystem skills.

path.description: For GitHub sources: subpath within the repo (e.g. monorepo skill directory). For local sources: absolute or ~-relative path to the skill directory.
